translations: v．剽窃，抄袭：把别人的作品、思想、言论等当作自己的成果，未经原作者许可擅自使用。

sentences.sentence: It thinks, in this paper, that "Appropriation" of New Historicism is not repeat copy, paste and plagiarizes passively; it is also not distortion, subversion assumption and digestion entirely.
sentences.translation: 本文认为新历史主义的“挪用”不是重复被动的“复制”、“粘贴”和抄袭，也不是完全扭曲、颠覆的臆断和消解。
